meanings.definition: The key on a keyboard that erases the character to the left of the cursor.
meanings.sent1: I pressed the backspaces to correct my mistake.
meanings.sent2: The backspaces on the keyboard are very useful for editing.
meanings.sent3: Using the backspaces quickly fixed the error in my document.
meanings.sent4: The backspaces acted like a magic eraser, making the error disappear.
meanings.sent5: The backspaces are like a helpful little genie granting editing wishes.

meanings.definition: To erase text by pressing the backspace key.
meanings.sent1: She backspaces to remove the extra words.
meanings.sent2: When typing, remember to backspaces if needed.
meanings.sent3: He backspaces with precision, fixing any errors effortlessly.
meanings.sent4: Backspacing through the text, she cleared her thoughts.
meanings.sent5: Backspaces can be a lifesaver when editing a document.

meanings.definition: To move backwards through a document or webpage by pressing the backspace key.
meanings.sent1: The user backspaces to review the previous content.
meanings.sent2: Backspaces allow you to navigate quickly through text.
meanings.sent3: Backspacing through the webpage, he found the information he needed.
meanings.sent4: She backspaces through the document like rewinding a tape.
meanings.sent5: Backspaces help you backtrack through your work efficiently.
